title.rendered: Kid With Pants Down Wanders Into Houston Rockets Postgame Show

content.rendered:
Reading Time: < 1 minute

After the Houston Rockets upset the Oklahoma City Thunder in Game 5 of their NBA playoff series, CSN Houston had a lot to discuss on its postgame show.

Namely the toddler with its pants down wandering out onto the empty OKC floor and straight into the middle of the network’s live camera shot.

Check out the awesome clip from Wednesday’s late night coverage:

It’s unclear who the offending youngster belongs to … but pretty funny. The only thing lacking here? An impromptu rendition of "Pants on the Ground."

No word on whether another half-naked toddler will attempt to video bomb TV coverage of this evening’s pivotal Game 6 in Houston. We can only hope.
